KinveyKit170APIDiffs Document

    KinveyKit 1.6.0 to KinveyKit 1.7.0 API Differences

    KinveyKit

    KCSAppdataStore.h
    Removed - [KCSAppdataStore setAuthHandler:]
    KCSCollection.h
    Removed - [KCSCollection setQuery:]
    KCSQuery.h
    Added - [KCSQuery setQuery:]
    KCSUser.h
    Added - [KCSUser setSessionAuth:]
    Added + [KCSUser loginWithFacebookAccessToken:withCompletionBlock:]
    KCSOfflineSaveDelegate.h
    Added - [KCSOfflineSaveDelegate shouldSave:lastSaveTime:]
    Added - [KCSOfflineSaveDelegate willSave:lastSaveTime:]
    Added - [KCSOfflineSaveDelegate didSave:]
    Added - [KCSOfflineSaveDelegate errorSaving:error:]
    KCSStore.h
    Added - [KCSStore setAuthHandler:]
    Added - [KCSStore storeWithOptions:]
    KCSOfflineSaveStore.h
    Added - [KCSOfflineSaveStore numberOfPendingSaves]
